name: Get Those Crawlers
description:
Get Those Crawlers is a game where the player needs to collect underground spiders moving on a grid.

Controls

WASD/ Arrow keys to assign moves (maximum 3 moves)

SPACE to apply moves to the player.

Game Description

The player will move after moves applied. The player will choose direction in order from first direction to the last direction in moves. The player will automatically moves to the edge of the grid after finished changing direction.

Assets

Sprite Images: Photopea, Gimp

Sound effect generated from https://sfxr.me/

VHS skin from czyzby/gdx-skins: Free libGDX Scene2D GUI themes (github.com)

Music from
